domain_registrar_profile_transfer_timeli.name: domain_registrar_profile_transfer_timeline_check
domain_registrar_profile_transfer_timeli.value: "domain_registrar_profiles"."transfer_completed_at" IS NULL OR "domain_registrar_profiles"."transfer_requested_at" IS NULL OR "domain_registrar_profiles"."transfer_completed_at" >= "domain_registrar_profiles"."transfer_requested_at"
